1.「俺は 魔獣をあやつり 世界に恐怖と混乱を| もたらした……。弁解の余地もない。: As you know, I was the master of the|Hexabeasts. The bringer of terror and chaos|to the world...

2.「魔獣との戦いに 身を投じてきた お前には| 話しておかねばなるまいな。: Since you've been fighting against me for so|long, the least I can do is give you a full|explanation.

Eternal Beast Nerosugog, Mourning Beast|Zontedor, Possessed Beast Zalborg, Multiplying|Beast Biologog...what were the four Demon|
|Beasts?

4.「かつて 俺は 神墟ナドラグラムで| 竜神の心臓を奪取した。: Once, I seized the Dragon God Heart in the|Nadragram Shrine.

The reason for this was that they needed the|enormous energy contained in the Dragon God|Heart to hatch the eggs of a special magical|
|beast hidden in the Royal Alchemia.

|absorbed into the cocoon of demise.

8.「その計画も お前の活躍により 完璧なものには| ならなかったが……魔獣の肉体を:
And while that plan may not have been|perfected thanks to your efforts... the life|form within the cocoon is steadily being|
|perfected by absorbing the body of the|Hexenbiest.

9.「そして キュロノスは 繭から羽化した| 生命体に おのが精神を移すことで| 完: And Kyuronos is attempting to receive a|perfect body by transferring his own spirit to|the life form that hatches from the cocoon.

10.「人の世を……世界を終わらせる そのために。: To end the world...to end the world.

11.「……キュロノスの支配下にあった 俺は| それを 未来を守るためと 信じ込まされ: Kyuronos had me convinced that it was to|protect the future, and I was forced to do|whatever he wanted me to do.

12.「実際は そのすべてが| 世界に仇なす行為だった……。: In fact, the whole thing was an act of|vengeance against the world...

13.「……時獄の迷宮に行き キュロノスを倒す。| それが 罪を重ねてきた 俺にできる: I will go to the Time Prison and defeat|Kyuronos. That's the least I can do to atone|for the many sins I've committed.

14.「また ひとりで 行くつもりなのね。| ムチャよ！ 回復したばかりなんでしょ？: You're going by yourself again. You can't do|this! You just got better, didn't you?

15.「メレアーデ……お前が無事で 安心した。| しかし この時代に 来ていたとは……: Mereade I am so relieved that you are safe.|But I had no idea you'd come in this time.

17.「私は……大丈夫よ。いろいろ あったけど……| <pc>に 助けてもらえたから。: I'm... okay. I've been through a lot, but|<pc> helped me through it.

18.「それよりも 叔父様。| 行くなら 私も連れていって。| 何か 手伝えることが: More importantly, Uncle. If you're going, take|me with you. There might be something I can|help you with.

19.「<pc>だって そう思うでしょ？| ふたりで 叔父様を助けましょうよ。: <pc> Because you think so, don't you?|Let's both help your uncle.

21.「時空の狭間にある 時獄の迷宮には 一度でも| そこへ到達した者しか 行くことが: The Time Prison Gap, located in the Spacetime|Gap, can only be accessed by those who have|been there once.

22.「いかに 時渡りのチカラが 強かろうと| 時獄の迷宮に入るのは 不可能だ。: No matter how powerful one is, it is|impossible to enter the Time Prison.

24.「今は 一刻を争うときだ。: Now is the time to act.

26.「すっかり 世話をかけたな <pc>。| 無事に やりとげたら あらためて礼に来: Thanks for all your help <pc>. I'll|come back to thank you when I'm done. Until|then, take care of Mereade.

27.「メレアーデも……気持ちだけで 充分だ。| 絶対 マローネを救いだしてみせる。|: And Mereade... the feeling is enough. I will|save Marone, I promise. So...don't worry too|much.

31.「どうやら 方針は 決まったキュね。| 王都キィンベルを目指して| エテーネルキ: It looks like we've decided on a course of|action. Launch the Ethenel Cube toward Royal|City Kimbel!

32.「……黒曜の隕石孔には 誰も近づかせるな。| 異変があったら すぐに 知らせろ。: ...No one is allowed near the Meteorite Hole.|If you see anything out of the ordinary, let|me know immediately. No matter how small.

35.「背なんか すっかり 高くなって……| 弟っていうよりも むしろ お兄さんね。: He's gotten so tall...he's more like an older|brother than a younger brother.

37.「エテーネに帰ってから すぐ| 姉さんの捜索を 始めたんだが| 手がかりすら見つ: I started searching for my sister as soon as I|got back to Ethene, but I couldn't even find a|clue, I was at a loss.

38.「そう…………。心配 かけたみたいね。| あなたは １０年以上も| ウルベア地下: Well... it looks like I worried you. I hear|you've been living in the Urbea Underground|City for over a decade...

39.「そして……処刑された とも……。| いったい どういうことなの？: And... executed... what the hell is going on?

41.「<kyodai>と 俺のために作った| ふたつの エテーネルキューブ……| こ: <kyodai> and the two Ethenel Cubes you|made for me... this is one of them.

Just before I hit the ground with a serious|wound, this thing activated and I was able to|come back to this time period. It was truly a|
|miracle...

46.「クオード……ねえ わかってるの？| あなたがやったことの 意味を。: Quard... hey, do you understand? Do you know|what you've done?

Didn't you swear to me that you would be a|king who protects the happiness of his people?|You can do as you please to the people of|
|another country!

48.「……俺を責めて 気がすむのなら いくらでも| 責めればいい。だが どんな犠牲を: Blame me all you want if it makes you feel|better. But no matter what the cost, he|couldn't have died in that time.

49.「エテーネ王国を 滅亡から救うまで| 俺は 死ねない！| この命は……エテーネの: I will not die until I have saved the Ethene|Kingdom from destruction! I will use my life|for the good of Ethene.

|happening.

Made Temple... that place must have been a|forbidden place sealed off by the royal|ancestors... if you want to know more about|

59.「だが エテーネの救済に つながるなら| 約束を たがえたりはしない……。| そ: But I will not renege on my promise if it|leads to the salvation of Ethene, I swear it|on my life!

|this man's eyes are blind.

65.「ただし やるからには 絶対に成功させるわよ！| この国に生きる すべての人たち: But if we're going to do this, we're going to|make it work! When we have protected the|future of everyone in this country...

72.「ややっ！？| <pc>さんじゃないですか！| いらっしゃい おひさしぶりですね: Yikes! Isn't that <pc>! Welcome, it's|been a long time!

73.「メ…メレアーデ様！？| 私は まぼろしでも 見てるんでしょうか……。: Mereade! Am I seeing things in a haunted|house?

77.「おーっと そうでした！？| ささっ。どうぞ おかけになってください。| 今 お: Oops, that was it! Quickly. Please have a|seat. I'll bring you some tea.

81.「はい！ 見た目は すっかり変わられましたが| クオード様は 以前のままですよぅ:
Yes, sir! He may look completely different,|but Mr. Quard is still the same as before. He|is a kind and gentle person with a straight|
|heart.

82.「ままま…前にも増して くくく国を愛し| 民を思いやるように な…なられた！|:
He has become even more loving to his country|and considerate of his people! It is a sign|that you are becoming more aware of your|
|position as king.

83.「……でででも どこか 遠くに感じる。| 心に何かを ひ…秘めてるような……。: But it feels somewhere far away. It's like|you're keeping something inside of you...

As a matter of fact, that's right. My|inexperience with the alchemy of Geode|Crystal, which is necessary for the project,|
|is taking a lot of time.

89.「できれば 自力で 完成させたかったのですが| この上は どなたか 優秀な錬金術: I had hoped to complete it myself, but now I'm|thinking of asking one of you talented|alchemists to do it for me...

90.「できそうな人に 心当たりはあるの？: Can you think of anyone who might be able to?

91.「う～ん かなり 高度な錬金術ですから| 相当な実力のある 錬金術師でないと……: Well, it is a very advanced alchemy, so it|must be a very skilled alchemist...I can't|think of any alchemist right away.

92.「そういうことなら 私と <pc>で| 地脈の結晶を 錬金できそうな人を探すわ。: In that case, I'll find someone who can smelt|Geode Crystals with me and <pc>.|<pc> is reliable, so don't worry!

93.「おお 手伝ってくださいますか！| ご協力 感謝 感謝ですよぉ。| これで 他に: Oh, you want to help us? Thank you so much for|your help. Now I can concentrate on preparing|other things I need!

94.「では <pc>さんには| こちらを お渡ししておきますね。: Then I will give you this one for|<pc>.

96.「そのレシピを 錬金術師に見せて| 作れるかどうか 聞いてみてください。: Show that recipe to the alchemist and ask him|if he can make it.

|introduce you to some excellent ones.

98.「……ワグミカさん。考えなおしてください。| あなたの錬金術のウデに 大勢の命と: ...Mr. Wagmika. Please reconsider. Many lives|and the future of the kingdom depend on your|alchemical skills.

99.「フン。どこかで見た カオだと思えば| ドミネウスの 娘っ子か！: Hmm. I've seen this face somewhere, and it's|Domineus' daughter!

100.「国を ほったらかしにして 行方を| くらませていた 王族の小娘ふぜいが| どの: How dare you lecture the mouth of a royal girl|who has left her country in the dust and|disappeared! Damn!

101.「同志 ワグミカ。本日の 農作業のノルマを| 達成いたしました……おっと| 来客: Comrade Wagmika. I have fulfilled my quota for|today's farm work... but I didn't know you|were here... and I'm so sorry!

104.「ぬしを見てると ドミネウスのクソを| 思いだして 気分が悪くなるわ！| 薬なん: You remind me of that Domineus shit and it|makes me sick! I don't give a shit who takes|my pills! Now go home!

105.「も…もうしわけないんだモーン。| ご主人も 飲みたくないと 言ってるので| 今: I'm sorry, I'm sorry, I'm sorry. Your husband|doesn't want to drink either, so I'd like you|to go home for now.

106.「ワグミカさんには お薬が必要よ。| モモンタルちゃんだって ずっと このままで: Wagmika needs to take her medicine.|Sanguintal, you don't think you can stay like|this forever, do you?

107.「ワグミカ殿！| 聞こえてますか？ ワグミカ殿！: Mister Wagmika! Can you hear me? Mister|Wagmika!

109.「水ぅううう……。| キンキンに冷えた 水ぅううう……。: Water... water so cold... water so cold...

110.「しょうのない ご主人なんだモン。| 今 お持ちするんだモーン。: It's your husband who has no choice. I'm|bringing it to you now, Morn.

112.「これを お使いください。| 身体じゅうの毒素を抜く 丸薬です。: Please use this. It is a pill that removes|toxins from the body.

113.「ちと……いや 超がつくほど 苦いのですが| 健全な身体になれば ワグミカ殿も|: It's a little...well, extremely bitter, but I|think a healthy body will help Mister Wagmika|get out of his self-indulgent lifestyle.

114.「ファ ファラス君……。| かたじけないッ……かたじけないモン！: Mr. Faras... I'm sorry... I'm sorry!

115.「真に 主が求めるものを見抜き| 主のために 行動できる者こそが 真の従者。|:
The true follower is the one who discerns what|the Lord truly desires and can act for the|Lord. I hope we can be like that for each|
|other.

116.「フンッ！ 民草のためならば 協力もしよう。| じゃが 相手が王族なら 話は別よ: Hmph! I'm willing to help if it's for the good|of the people. But if they're royalty, that's|a different story! I won't move a finger!

117.「あっかん べろべろべぇ～！| ドミネウスの娘よッ！ ぬしも 人生がクソだと|: Akkan, beroberobee~! Daughter of|Domineus! You, my dear, learn that life|sucks! Whee-hee-hee-hee!

118.「ゴシュジーン！！ 見苦しいモーンッ！| 今すぐ ファラス君のくれた あの薬を飲: Gosh darn it!!!! You're not making me look|good, Morn! Now take that potion Mr. Faras|gave you and come to your senses, Morn!

119.「だまらっしゃ～い！| ワシに作られた 魔法生物がッ！| 主人である ワシに 指: Shut up! You magical creatures created by me!|You dare to dictate to me, your master!

120.「クソぅ……何もかも ドミネウスのせいじゃ。| ワシから 仕事を！ 地位を！ 生:
Damn... it's all Domineus' fault. Get me a|job! A position! My reason for living! It's|Domineus' fucking fault! He took everything|
|from me!

121.「いいかげんに するんだモンッ！| ドミネウスが クソだからって ご主人が| 腐: Enough! Just because Domineus sucks doesn't|mean your husband can't rot!

122.「ご主人を頼ってきた <pc>君や| メレアーデ君に チカラを貸してあげるモン！:
I'm here to lend a helping hand to| and Mr. Mereade, who have come|to depend on your husband! Don't let them|
|think that life sucks.

123.「そんな ムダなことをして ワシに| なんの得があると いうんじゃい！: What's in it for me by wasting my time like|that!

|and rotten because life sucks.

|improperly.

|places.

238.「ブフィ～。ひさかたぶりに 真の姿を| 取り戻したキュレ！| かつてない 高ぶり: Bufi~! For the first time in a long time, my|true form is restored. I feel an unprecedented|high, Cure~!

239.「キュ～レ♪ キュレキュレ♪ キュ～レキュレ♪| ７００年ぶりの時見を ためして: Cure Cure Cure Cure Cure Cure Cure Cure Cure|Cure Cure Cure Cure Cure Cure Cure Cure Cure|Cure Cure Cure Cure Cure Cure Cure Cure Cure.

|City, it will be unstoppable.

253.「……やれやれ。せっかちな奴だキュレ。| でも お前たちは 動じていないキュレね: Oh dear. Impatient guy, huh? But you guys are|unfazed, aren't you?

If you are a true master of the art of time|telling, you can show us a future in which|meteorite annihilation is averted... can't|
|you?

257.「そんな お前には 隕石落下を阻止する| とっておきの秘策を さずけてやるキュレ: I'll give you a secret plan to stop the|meteorite from falling on you.

259.「王都キィンベルの 中央広場には| 永久時環と名付けられた 砂時計のような| 建: Did you know that in the center plaza of Royal|City Kimbel, there is an hourglass-like|structure named the Eternal Ring?

260.「永久時環は ただの芸術作品ではないキュレ。| 空中に散らばる 微量な時渡りのチ:
The Eternal Ring is not just a work of art. It|is a device with the function of extracting|and storing a minute amount of time-traveling|
|power scattered in the air.

261.「かつて レトリウスと 腹心のユマテルという| 錬金術師が 子孫が起こすであろう:
Retrius and his consort, an alchemist named|Umater, built the cure in anticipation of the|mistakes that would be made by their|
|descendants.

262.「……あいつらは たいした知恵者だったキュレ。| 永久時環を用いれば 隕石という: ...They were very clever, I must say. With|Eternal Ring, even the calamity of a meteorite|would be nothing.

263.「ただし 永久時環を 起動させるには| レトリウスの血をひく者……: However, in order to activate the Eternal|Ring, a person of Retrius' blood...

264.「ここを出て 右手の通路を進めば| マデ氏族の叡智が眠る 祭具棟と呼ばれる場所に:
If you leave here and follow the passage on|your right, you will reach a place called the|ritual building, where the wisdom of the Made|
|clan rests.

265.「まず 祭具棟へ行って 花のリストレットを探し| それを身につけて 戻ってくるキ: First, the cure goes to the ritual, finds a|flower wristlet, puts it on, and returns. Then|the story continues with the cure.

266.「おお！ 戻ってきたキュレね。| 花のリストレットは 見つけたキュレ？: Oh! The cure is back. Did you find the flower|wristlet, Cure?

267.「さっそく 永久時環の起動法を| 伝授するキュレ。もっと そばに来るキュレ。: Cure quickly teaches him how to activate the|Eternal Ring. He comes closer to me.

268.「脳に直接 大量の情報を送るから| ちょ～っと 具合が 悪くなるかもしれないけど: It sends a lot of information directly to your|brain, so you might get a little sick, but|you'll just have to hold on and endure!

270.「……私が チカラを取り戻したのを| キュロノスに 感知されたようキュレ。: Kyuronos seemed to sense that I had regained|my strength.

271.「私は 正しき時の流れの 守護者。: I am the guardian of the righteous flow of|time.

272.「来たるべき未来を さまたげんとする者よ。| キュロノスの裁きを 受けよ！: Let those who would hinder the coming future|be judged by Cyronos! Let Kyuronos judge you!

273.<center>貴様が キュレクス……。|我が祖にして 同等の能力をもつ個体。: You are Kyurex, my ancestor, and an individual|of equal ability.

274.<center>なんと ちっぽけな。|失望を 禁じ得ない……。: How tiny. I can't help but be disappointed...

275.<center>なれど 貴様の存在を許したとあれば|雑音なき世界を到来させる さ: But if we allow you to exist, you will be a|hindrance to the coming of a world without|noise.

276.「あわれな……。時見を通じ 幾度となく| 人間たちの闇を 直視し続けた果てに|:
You are a cure who has been facing the|darkness of the human race through time and|time again, and you yourself have become|
|distorted.

277.「さわがしいキュ！ 安眠妨害っキュよ！: It's making too much noise! You're disturbing|my sleep!

281.<center>邪魔者は 排除した。|残るは……時の異分子に協力する|同祖の個体: The obstacles are eliminated. All that|remains...are those of the same ancestry who|cooperate with Time Aliens...

282.<center>なれど 時見すらできぬ 未熟な個体など|手を下すに 値せず。: But immature individuals who cannot even see|the time do not deserve to be touched.

283.<center>我こそは 唯一無二の 時の支配者。|ならぶ者なき 究極の存在。: I am the one and only ruler of time. The|ultimate existence without equal.

285.「もう 間にあわないキュレ……| それより 小さき者よ……私のそばに……。: It's too late, Cure... or, better yet, little|one... stay close to me...

286.「ボクのことは キュルルと呼ぶキュ。| ……お前を見てると モヤモヤするんだけど: You call me Kyururu. When I look at you, I'm|confused, but who the hell are you?

287.「その様子だと……私のことはおろか| 自分が何者かも 理解していないキュレね。|: By the looks of you... you don't even know who|you are, let alone who I am. Quickly, take my|hand... my hand...

288.「なるほど……お前もまた| 私のチカラの源から 分化した存在……。: I see... you are also an offshoot of the|source of my power...

289.「それって 親子みたいなものキュ？: Is that like a parent and child, Cu?

290.「親子という概念には 当てはまらないキュレ。| 私たちは 同一にして 異質なる存:
Cure does not fit the concept of parent and|child. We are two beings, one and the same,|wandering in the Spacetime Gap, different|
|worlds, different life forms.

291.「もう 時間がないキュレ……。| キュルル……お前に 私の……| 知識と能力のす: We are running out of time Kyururu...|Kyururu... I give you all of my knowledge and|abilities.

293.「……おかしいキュ。| む…胸が……胸が 苦しいキュ！| シクシクと 痛みが 消: ...It's not right. My chest... my chest is|painful! The pain won't go away.

294.「……彼の死を 悲しいと感じてるからよ。| あなたにとって キュレクスさんが|: Because you feel sad about his death. It shows|how special Mr. Kyurex was to you.

295.「たった今 出会ったばかりの相手に| 調子を狂わされるなんて 理解不能キュ。|: I can't understand how someone I just met|could make me lose my temper. I'll change my|mind as soon as possible.

296.「アイツから 受け取った知識に 永久時環の| 起動のしかたがあったキュ！ 隕石落:
The knowledge I received from him was how to|activate the Eternal Ring! If you want to|avoid a future of falling meteorites, you'd|
|better hurry.

297.「……わかったわ。王都の広場にある| 永久時環を 動かしにいきましょう。: Okay. Let's go move the Eternal Ring in the|plaza in Royal City.

298.「メレアーデよ お前が 資格者の証を| 身につける必要があるキュレ。お前からは|: Mereade, you need to wear the credentials,|Cure. I feel the blood of Retrius most|strongly in you, Cure.

299.「水没する未来を 回避したことによって| より 大きな災厄が おそってくるキュレ: The avoidance of a submerged future brings|greater calamity, Cure.
